About Me

Story

I love to learn new technology! After spending much of my career working as a process engineer in gas and oil fields, I've always tried to automate routine working tasks to calculate the technology process. When I moved to USA I started thinking to change my career path into IT field. Several courses, including Quality Assurance courses, HTML, CSS and Javascript courses and working with real projects got me interested in programming more and more. All of this led me to The Grace Hopper program at Fullstack academy of Code. Now that I've had a chance to learn and work with Javascript using PosgreSQL, Express, React and Node I'm excited to join a team as a software engineer working on interesting problems. In free time you can find me with my family, in travel or playing around with my dog.

NYSHEX, New York, USA

Front End Engineer, Consultant May 2019 - Present

  • Built new form navigation feature with React and Redux that increased number of form submissions by 12%
  • Created new reusable React components for shared library, which leads to speed up team work by 20%
  • Worked on improving test coverage, resulting in 25% test coverage increase

JoatSpace, New York, USA

Front End Engineer, Intern April 2019 - Present

  • Developed critical features for admin application, including Dashboard, Tasker Applications and Help Center with React, Redux, Semantic-UI, Firebase
  • Achieved productivity improvement of application by 50% by implementation feature of listening for real-time database updates for fetching data and deleting, adding and editing functionalities of application

Adventa - Voronezh, Russia

Software Engineer, Freelancer January 2018 - December 2018

  • Implemented web design and development principles to build new web pages of e-commerce site, including shopping cart, checkout page with HTML, CSS, AJAX, Javascript; increasing sales by 15% in 3 months
  • Created responsive emails with media queries which improved customers sign ups to the products by 22%
